channel.title: Self Esteem & Confidence on
channel.description: Recent content in Self Esteem & Confidence on

item.title: Success Mindset Mastery 2021
item.description:
Most of people spent quite a bit of time thinking about what constitutes success, how they will achieve it, and how good they'll feel when they achieve their goals. In this course you will learn 5 key steps that will help you reach your goals and accomplish what you’ve set out to do. Learn how to nurture a mindset of success to become an unstoppable entrepreneur.
Success Mindset Course For EVERY Level

item.title: Comunicazione: come gestirla in maniera efficace
item.description: In questo corso ti spiegherò nei minimi dettagli come poter superare le difficoltà del parlare in pubblico e rendere più incisivo il tuo modo di Comunicare. Esporrò tecniche precise e dettagliate, ti darò consigli teorici e pratici per far sì che tu possa padroneggiare nel migliore dei modi la Voce(intesa come Contenuto e Comunicazione Para-Verbale) ed il linguaggio del corpo (Comunicazione Non Verbale) spiegandoti l'importanza del tenere viva l'attenzione dall'esordio alla conclusione di un discorso.

item.title: Complete Confidence Building Course - Exude Confidence Now
item.description: Complete Confidence Building Course - Exude Confidence NowBuild Your Confidence - Increase Self-Esteem - Radiate More Confidence - Become a Truly Confident Person - Communication Imagine going through life filled with confidence. You are confident in your abilities, your talents, your communication skills, your appearance and in having an accurate sense of how others perceive you. and other people judge you as supremely confident (though not cocky or arrogant!) Confidence is not something you are born with.

item.title: Cultivating Gratitude with MRS JOY
item.description:
Here's what you'll discover inside of this life-changing online course with MRS JOY:
Learn that gratitude is a state of being. Learn how to use gratitude in your relationships to develop a deeper connection. Learn how the power of positive emotions and gratitude can change your life. Discover how practicing mindfulness and meditation can cultivate an attitude of gratitude. Discover what unbalanced gratitude is and how you can counteract it.
